title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: ICT-Based English Teaching Method Design Utilizing Social Media and Film

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design English lesson plans based on movie content using social media platforms.
Learners can develop three or more interactive activities that enhance learner engagement in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can create and share English educational materials using smartphone-based tools (e.g., video editing apps, quiz platforms).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
